content: Could someone please review PR #30814? This PR adds some basic results in linear algebra. First, we define a complement to ker f and the decomposition V = ker f ⊕ kerComplement f. Furthermore, we prove that there exist bases v₁ of V and v₂ of W such that toMatrix v₁ v₂ f = fromBlocks 1 0 0 0.
This all seems highly noncanonical (why are you choosing a basis?)
